metadata.title: CVE-2024-27082 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti provides an operational monitoring and fault management framework.Versions of Cacti prior to 1.2.27 are vulnerable to stored cross-sitescripting, a type of cross-site scripting where malicious scripts arepermanently stored on a target server and served to users who access aparticular page. Version 1.2.27 contains a patch for the issue.

criterions.comment: cacti package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
